titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to F. W. Smith
CWG13657

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 11; Bundles of AG & QMG Expenditures 1864-65; Bundle 1

body.p:
No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To F. W. Smith Dr.

row.cell: To Services as Hospital Steward at the Frankfort Hospital for 11 days at 30$ per month.

body.p: I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.
Wm H Gardner Surgeon in city Hospital

Received at Frankfort, Ky, the 11th of May, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-master ^Genl of^ Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Eleven Dollars and -- Cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)

326
No. 22.
No 81 Abstract B G Qr. 186.
F. W. Smith
Dollars 11.00/100
Paid May 11th, 1864.
Hospital
Services rendered
I 242
(Certif. No. 197.)
